data.title: 5K Sap Run
data.meta_description: Just as the maple sap runs after the long winter gives way to spring warmth, runners can also get out and run in the sun at the Little Canada 5K Sap Run around beautiful Gervais Lake.
data.text:
Just as the maple sap runs after the long winter gives way to spring warmth, runners can also get out and run in the sun at the Little Canada 5K Sap Run around beautiful Gervais Lake on Saturday, May 4, 2024. Little Canadaâ€™s logo includes a maple leaf, which was the inspiration for this spring race. Join us for a competitive race or a fun run/walk and start the spring off on the right foot.

Participants will receive a Sap Run t-shirt, finisher's medal, and swag bag with a mini bottle of Bell's Maple Syrup.

Winners for each age category (see the chart below) will receive an EXCLUSIVE Sap Run quarter zip! Quarter zips are made to order, so winners will receive their prize within one month of the race.

Registration opened February 1.

Registration:

$35 through March 31st

$40 April 1 to April 30

$45 May 1 to May 6

$50 on Race Day

(-$5 if you choose not to have a race-day t-shirt)

Schedule of Events:

7:00 AM - Race day registration and packet pickup

8:00 AM - 5K Start
